title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' Week 18 NFL Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Big Ben's Career, Mysterious Aaron
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' Week 18 NFL Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Big Ben's Career, Mysterious Aaron
description:
Colin does "Fake Questions, Real Answers" on Colin does "Fake Questions, Real Answers" (3:00) on his write-in vote for NFL Comeback Player of the Year, how Big Ben reminds Colin of one of Hollywood's most complicated actors, why he likes Georgia vs Alabama but doesn't like Powerball, the perfect gift for his birthday, and the Super Bowl matchup that he wants to see most. Then, the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 18 picks are "sharp" or "square". They, give their picks for Cowboys/Eagles (23:00), Saints/Falcons (25:00), Niners/Rams (26:00), Pats/Dolphins (28:00), Chargers/Raiders (33:00), Colts/Jags, Titans/Texans (35:00). Chad also gives his tastiest prop of the week (36:00), and tell Colin if he's on the right side of the Bama/Georgia CFP Title Game.

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
